literals: "Found Cloudfront instance with Resource Id: [{}] distributing content without authorization."
"This rule checks for unauthorized cloudfront distribution."

* Purpose: This rule checks for cloudfront resources serving content without
 * authorization
 * 
 * Author: pavankumarchaitanya
 * 
 * Reviewers: Kamal, Kanchana
 * 
 * Modified Date: April 15th, 2019

* The method will get triggered from Rule Engine with following parameters * * ************* Following are the Rule Parameters*********
* * ruleKey : check-for-unauthorized-cloudfront-distribution
*
* * @param resourceAttributes * this is a resource in context which needs to be scanned this is * provided by execution engine *
